caption.p: Treatment effects for (a) leaf area, (b) root area, c) total root length, and d) SRL (specific root length) of V. thapsus growing with biocide applications: C = control (i.e., no biota exclusion); B = bactericide (i.e., exclusion of bacteria); F = fungicide (i.e., exclusion of fungi); BF = bactericide/fungicide combined (i.e., exclusion of bacteria and fungi). Small letters on top of the boxes indicate significant differences according to the Tukey post hoc analysis. For statistical details, see Table 2
